titles.title: Eliminate Shutdowns Act
Eliminate Shutdowns Act
A bill to provide for automatic continuing appropriations.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 161.

action.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of measure made in Senate.
Cloture motion on the motion to proceed to the measure presented in Senate.
